question: What is the name of the interaction series launched by the Department of Science and Technology, to formulate STIP 2020?
explanation:
The Department of Science and Technology (DST) is launching a series of exclusive interactions with experts across the country named ‘In Conversation with’.
This is a part of the process of the DST and the Office of the Principal Scientific Adviser (PSA) to the Government of India, in formulating the Science, Technology and Innovation Policy (STIP 2020). This is the fifth edition of the policy and will replace the existing policy, which was formulated in 2013.
